channel.title: Help with something! :) :) :) :) :)
channel.description:
how to make a popup shop like when you get 2k pkpoints it pops upp a shop and u can choose 1 item from that shop? almost like the void but except it pops upp instead?
2. how to make a item untradable
3. how to make a custom gs into a 2h?
4. how to make commands that change weather until i type ::reset command (including restarts) like when i restart server and goes on again its still raining?
5. how to make a fully working snowglobe with a snowballs that you can throw?

item.title: Help with something! :) :) :) :) :)
item.dc:creator: @wwe_justin wwe justin
item.description:
@wwe_justin wrote:

i can only help you with the resetart one heres the command code

if (command.startsWith("update") && (command.length() > 7) && (playerRights > 3)) { PlayerHandler.updateSeconds = (Integer.parseInt(command .substring(7)) + 1); PlayerHandler.updateAnnounced = false; PlayerHandler.updateRunning = true; PlayerHandler.updateStartTime = System.currentTimeMillis(); }

so when you wanna update something for eg. you wanna update your server for 30 secs until it turns off so you do

::update 30

hope that helps =P

Read full topic
